intent_atoms.description: Migrate metadata display patterns across the ISOInspector UI to use the FoundationUI DS.KeyValueRow component via a new BoxMetadataRow wrapper that supports label, value, and optional copyable action.
Audit all current metadata display patterns (row heights, spacing, font sizes, colors).
Create BoxMetadataRow wrapper around DS.KeyValueRow supporting label, value, optional copyable action, inheriting dark mode and accessibility from FoundationUI.
Refactor all metadata field displays to use BoxMetadataRow for ISO box metadata, parse results, issue summaries, codec/track info, file header details.
Unit tests for BoxMetadataRow component with ≥90% coverage.
Snapshot tests validating layout, colors, dark mode adaptation.
Accessibility tests confirming WCAG 2.1 AA compliance (≥98% score).
Integration tests with copyable action behavior.
Regression tests ensuring existing metadata displays still function correctly.
Add BoxMetadataRow to ComponentTestApp showcase screen.
Update Design System Guide with migration patterns.
Maintain test coverage ≥80% across affected targets.
All Phase 0 tasks must be complete before starting this task.
I1.1 and I1.2 must be completed before starting this task.
BoxMetadataRow will wrap DS.KeyValueRow to provide consistent styling, dark mode inheritance, accessibility, and optional copyable action.

functional_units.name: BoxMetadataRow Component
functional_units.description: A reusable UI component that wraps FoundationUI's DS.KeyValueRow to display a label and value pair with optional copy-to-clipboard action, inheriting dark mode and accessibility features.

functional_units.name: Metadata Display Audit Tool
functional_units.description: An internal process or script that inventories all current metadata display patterns across ISOInspector UI, documenting spacing, fonts, colors, and accessibility attributes.

functional_units.name: CopyableAction Integration
functional_units.description: Implementation of a copy-to-clipboard action for metadata values, providing visual/haptic feedback and supporting iOS, iPadOS, and macOS platforms.

functional_units.name: Metadata Migration Workflow
functional_units.description: A refactoring workflow that replaces existing metadata field displays with BoxMetadataRow across screens such as Box Details, Parse Results, Codec/Track info, and File Header details.

functional_units.name: Unit Test Suite for BoxMetadataRow
functional_units.description: Automated tests ensuring component behavior, state management, and API surface meet 90%+ coverage requirements.

functional_units.name: Snapshot Testing for Layout & Dark Mode
functional_units.description: Tests that capture UI snapshots of BoxMetadataRow in various states to validate layout, colors, and dark mode adaptation against approved baselines.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Compliance Tests
functional_units.description: Automated checks confirming WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with ≥98% score for the metadata display components.

functional_units.name: Integration Test Suite for Copyable Action
functional_units.description: Tests that simulate user interactions with the copy button, verifying clipboard behavior and feedback across platforms.

functional_units.name: Regression Test Suite for Existing Metadata Displays
functional_units.description: Tests ensuring that refactored metadata displays continue to function correctly without breaking existing UI behavior.

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Showcase Screen
functional_units.description: A screen in ComponentTestApp that demonstrates BoxMetadataRow usage within the design system showcase.

functional_units.name: Design System Guide Update
functional_units.description: Documentation updates that describe the migration patterns, component API, and styling guidelines for BoxMetadataRow.
